overview: Second origin film about Yan Chixia - legendary master exorcist from cult film Chinese Ghost Story. In his new quest he and another monster slayer Ye Tianqing travel to investigate the disappearance of thousand-year-old town of Yueling. One day town was separated by a invisible barrier and the court suspected that it was the work of the Giant Scorpio
title: Yan Chixia and Five-Tailed Scorpio
